text:
Hi. I have problew. After registration on Customer portal, user is redirected to the ticket detail(see screenshot), not main page of customer portal. How can I change this?
In a little more detail, user get registration link from default HubSpot email
Does anyone know how it fix?

we want to create such a page for the contact that's logged in, the subscription opted out property is read only and workflows can only subscribe them once, so is there any other way to make this out with cms without having to send a mail link with cta to resubscribe ? <@U7SL518D6>
